short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Temporaray bookmarks is a bookmarking tool for saving web pages only for temporary.
short.ko: 특정시간 후에 자동으로 삭제되는 북마크(즐겨찾기) 툴입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I usually save many web pages into my bookmarks to visit that again, but many web pages are only for temporary, and it makes my bookmarks massy later, because it's quiet annoying to delete them after visiting.

So I made a Temporary bookmarks to save temporary webpage, the bookmarks will be removed from the list automatically by the time you set. 

If you like it or any question, please leave your review.

Thank you.

Change log:
V.2.0.0
- Added Temporary bookmark adding function in context menu

V.1.4.0 
- Using Chrome Sync to sync list across multiple devices
long.ko:
I usually save many web pages into my bookmarks to visit that again, but many web pages are just for temporary, and it makes my bookmarks massy later, because it's quiet annoying to delete them after visiting. (Slacker!)

So I made a Temporary bookmarks to save temporary webpage, the bookmarks will be removed from the list automatically by the time you set. 

I set short-cut key (CMD+b) for this Temporary bookmarks and use it, it changes my life! (..some part of, maybe :))

If you like it or any question, please leave your review.

Thank you.
